subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets will travel to Wrigley Field this weekend, and Cubs fans will probably wince when they see Moises Alou and Luis Castillo together in the Mets’ starting lineup.
snippet: The Mets will travel to Wrigley Field this weekend, and Cubs fans will probably wince when they see Moises Alou and Luis Castillo together in the Mets’ starting lineup.
